ideas.title: Tic Tac Toe
ideas.description: A simple tic tac toe game

ideas.title: Code Snippets
ideas.description: A collection of code snippets  which allows you to copy paste your code snippet and lets you to download it as an image to share!

ideas.title: Weather App
ideas.description: A simple weather app which shows the current weather and the forecast for the next 5 days

ideas.title: Calculator
ideas.description: A simple calculator which can perform basic arithmetic operations

ideas.title: To Do List
ideas.description: A simple to do list app which allows you to add, delete and edit your to do list

ideas.title: Note Taker
ideas.description: A simple note taker app which allows you to add, delete and edit your notes

ideas.title: Calendar
ideas.description: A simple calendar app which allows you to add, delete and edit your events

ideas.title: Threads
ideas.description: Build a react application for creating threads like in Twitter with a model, allowing multiple threads, tweet size constraints, and display them on the home page.

ideas.title: Animations
ideas.description: Build a react application for creating animations like in Twitter with a model, allowing multiple animations, animation size constraints, and display them on the home page.

ideas.title: React Editor
ideas.description: Build an Editor for users to type texts and do formatting like bold, italic, underline, alignments, and strikethrough.

ideas.title: Chatter
ideas.description: Build a chat application for users to chat with each other. This project doesn't use any bots.

ideas.title: GitHub User Search
ideas.description: Build a react application for searching GitHub users.
